title: e-Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Feedback Effect Analysis in Online Math Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can differentiate the utility of text/video feedback during math project execution.
Learners can assess differences in learning engagement by feedback type with over 70% accuracy.
The impact of blended feedback strategies on problem-solving skills can be presented through quantitative data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
